title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The updating of checkboxes takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) to reflect the checked state of the table.
EB: The updating of checkboxes should be faster and a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate the ongoing process.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. In a workspace with many projects, perform the export Zip action. 2. Select all projects. 3. Choose the desired file types. 4. Press the OK button.
